React: Nowadays React is one of most popular libraries for development web-applications
ReactRedux: Using React Redux help us to develop app which matches FLUX-architecture
ReactToolkit: Redux Toolkit is a newer version of React Redux which unify development process
Storybook: Developing with Storybook is a good example when we have tests and design of our app in one pack
Typescript: Today projects become more difficult, that's why it's necessary to use Typescript for saving dev time
Angular: Angular lets you start small and supports you as your team and apps grow
NextJS: Next.js enables you to create full-stack web applications by extending the latest React features
Gatsby: Build a fast, secure, and powerful website using React-based, open-source framework
Material: Such libraries gives us opportunity to make beautiful app design in short time
RestAPI: All data is located on server, that's why it's necessary know API methods
Jest: Today developers make many deploys of app per day, that's necessary to support app with testing system
Git: It's comfortable to develop app, especially in group, using GIT, which gives you control for any step
